itemDisplayName: TLG (Test Lab Guide) - 3 VM Base Configuration (v1.0)
description: This template deploys the TLG (Test Lab Guide) 3 VM Base Configuration, a Test Lab Guide solution used as a base build for a variety of test labs. This template provisions a Windows Server 2012 R2 or 2016 Active Directory domain controller using the specified domain name, an application server running Windows Server 2012 R2 or 2016, and optionally a client VM running Windows 10.
summary: Deploys 3 VMs: Server 2012 R2 or 2016 AD DC, Server 2012 R2 or 2016 app server and Windows 10 client. Provisions an AD domain and joins member VMs.
